ArchiTech: Deliverable for the TechCrunch Disrupt SF Hackathon 2019
  • Hackathon
  • 3D-Mapping
  • Feasibility-Analysis
  • Urban-Planning
  • MapBox-API
Oct 4, 2019

ArchiTech uses publicly available data to run zoning analysis scenarios on a property in San Francisco. Working in a team of five, my role was to gather, edit, and clean GIS data (using Python Pandas, and using some SQL in QGIS). I learned how to use MapBoxâ€™s API to render 3D visualization of a target property model. More info on the project can be found on Devpost.
